title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
description: Build the core platform that powers intelligent automation for enterprise operations teams. You'll architect scalable systems, design intuitive APIs, and ship features that handle millions of workflow executions.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with TypeScript, React, and Node.js
Deep understanding of distributed systems and microservices architecture
Experience building and scaling production APIs serving 10k+ requests/second
Strong system design skills with focus on reliability and observability
Track record of shipping high-quality code in fast-paced environments
responsibilities: Design and implement core platform features from API to UI
Build robust automation workflows with error handling and retry logic
Collaborate with product and design on feature specifications
Mentor junior engineers through code review and pair programming
Contribute to architectural decisions and technical strategy
niceToHave: Experience with AI/ML systems or LLM integration
Background in workflow engines (Temporal, Airflow, Prefect)
Contributions to open-source projects
Previous experience at B2B SaaS companies

title: Product Designer
description: Shape the experience for operations teams managing complex automation workflows. You'll design interfaces that balance power and simplicity, conducting user research and iterating based on feedback.
requirements: 4+ years of product design experience, preferably in B2B SaaS
Strong portfolio demonstrating end-to-end design process
Expertise in Figma with component-based design systems
Experience conducting user research and usability testing
Excellent communication skills for cross-functional collaboration
responsibilities: Design intuitive workflows for complex automation configurations
Create and maintain design system components and patterns
Conduct user research to validate design decisions
Collaborate with engineering on implementation details
Present design rationale to stakeholders and leadership
niceToHave: Experience designing dashboard and analytics interfaces
Knowledge of accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA+)
Familiarity with front-end development (HTML/CSS/JS)
Previous work on developer-facing products

title: Customer Success Manager
description: Partner with enterprise customers to design, deploy, and optimize automation strategies that drive measurable business impact. You'll become a trusted advisor, understanding operational challenges and translating them into technical solutions.
requirements: 3+ years in customer success, account management, or solutions consulting
Strong technical aptitude with ability to learn complex software systems
Experience managing enterprise accounts with $100k+ ARR
Excellent communication skills for executive and technical audiences
Data-driven approach to measuring customer health and ROI
responsibilities: Own customer relationships from onboarding through renewal
Design automation strategies aligned with business objectives
Conduct quarterly business reviews with customer stakeholders
Identify expansion opportunities and drive upsells
Advocate for customer needs in product roadmap discussions
niceToHave: Experience in operations, supply chain, or logistics domains
Background in implementation or professional services
Familiarity with workflow automation or RPA tools
Previous experience selling or supporting B2B SaaS

title: DevOps / Platform Engineer
description: Build and maintain the infrastructure that powers Artifically's automation platform. You'll own CI/CD pipelines, monitoring systems, and deployment automation while ensuring 99.9% uptime.
requirements: 4+ years of DevOps or platform engineering experience
Expert knowledge of AWS (ECS, RDS, S3, CloudWatch, Lambda)
Strong experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform or CloudFormation)
Proficiency with container orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
Deep understanding of observability tools (DataDog, Prometheus, Grafana)
responsibilities: Design and maintain cloud infrastructure on AWS
Build CI/CD pipelines for rapid, reliable deployments
Implement monitoring, alerting, and incident response systems
Optimize infrastructure costs and performance
Ensure security best practices and compliance requirements
niceToHave: Experience with multi-tenant SaaS architecture
Background in security engineering or compliance (SOC 2, ISO 27001)
Familiarity with service mesh technologies (Istio, Linkerd)
Previous experience at high-growth startups

title: Technical Writer
description: Create comprehensive documentation that helps developers and operations teams successfully adopt Artifically. You'll write API guides, tutorials, and best practice content.
requirements: 3+ years of technical writing experience for developer audiences
Ability to understand and explain complex technical concepts clearly
Experience documenting APIs, SDKs, or developer platforms
Strong editing skills with attention to detail
Portfolio demonstrating clean, well-structured documentation
responsibilities: Write and maintain API reference documentation
Create tutorials and how-to guides for common use cases
Develop best practice content for automation workflows
Collaborate with engineering to document new features
Improve documentation based on user feedback and analytics
niceToHave: Experience with documentation platforms (GitBook, ReadMe, Docusaurus)
Technical background or coding experience
Familiarity with Markdown and version control (Git)
Previous experience at developer tools companies

title: Sales Development Representative
description: Drive pipeline generation by identifying and qualifying high-value prospects. You'll be the first point of contact for companies exploring automation solutions.
requirements: 1-2 years of SDR experience, preferably in B2B SaaS
Strong communication skills via phone, email, and LinkedIn
Ability to learn and articulate technical value propositions
Self-motivated with consistent track record of hitting quotas
Experience with CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot)
responsibilities: Generate qualified leads through outbound prospecting
Conduct discovery calls to understand prospect needs
Schedule demos for Account Executives
Maintain accurate records in CRM
Collaborate with marketing on campaign effectiveness
niceToHave: Experience selling to operations or IT leaders
Background in supply chain, logistics, or healthcare
Familiarity with automation or AI technologies
Previous experience at Series A-C startups
